it.polimi.se2019.model

Class AmmoList

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2019.model.AmmoList
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class AmmoList
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    The AmmoList class keeps track of the current number of ammos a player has.
    Author:
    FedericoMainettiGambera, LudoLerma
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • addAmmoCubesOfColor

        public void addAmmoCubesOfColor(AmmoCubesColor color,
                                int quantity)
        add a specific amount of ammo of a specific color to the ArrayList of AmmoCubes. this method uses the AmmoCubes.addQuantity(int quantity) method that makes sure that the resulting quantity is never more than GameConstant.MAX_NUMBER_OF_AMMO_CUBES.
        Parameters:
        quantity - indicates how many ammos
        color - indicates the color of the ammo (blue, yellow or red)

      • canPayAmmoCubes

        boolean canPayAmmoCubes(AmmoCubesColor color,
                        int quantity)
        checks if an amount of ammos can be payed with the current this.ammoCubesList status
        Parameters:
        color - of the ammo
        quantity - of ammos
        Returns:
        boolean value that indicates if the player can pay or not

      • canPayAmmoCubes

        boolean canPayAmmoCubes(AmmoList cost)
        checks if an amount of ammos can be payed with the current this.ammoCubesList status
        Parameters:
        cost - the ammo list to be paid
        Returns:
        boolean value that indicates if the cost can be paid for

      • payAmmoCubes

        boolean payAmmoCubes(AmmoCubesColor color,
                     int quantity)
        subtract a specified amount of ammos to the current this.ammoCubesList of the player. Also this method checks if the payment can be done or not using the canPayAmmoCubes(...) method.
        Parameters:
        quantity - quantity due to pay
        color - color of the ammo to pay
        Returns:
        boolean

      • payAmmoCubes

        boolean payAmmoCubes(AmmoList cost)
        subtract a specified amount of ammos to the current this.ammoCubesList of the player. Also this method checks if the payment can be done or not using the canPayAmmoCubes(...) method.
        Parameters:
        cost - indicates how many ammos you need to pay
        Returns:
        boolean
